Efendi Nahi.verse 57:1: Perëndinë e falenderon çdo gjë që është në qiej dhe në Tokë, e Ai është i Plotëfuqishëm dhe i Gjithëdijshëm.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:2: Pushteti i Tij është në qiej dhe në Tokë; jeta dhe vdekja janë vepër e Tij, dhe Ai është i pushtetshëm për çdo gjë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:3: Ai është i Pari dhe i Mbrami, edhe i Dukshmi edhe i Padukshmi, dhe Ai është i dijshëm për çdo gjë!
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:4: Ai ka krijuar qiejt dhe Tokën për gjashtë ditë (periudha kohore), dhe pastaj mbisundoi Arshin (Gjithësinë); Ai di se çka hyn në Tokë dhe çka del prej saj, çka zbret prej qiellit dhe çka ngritet kah ai.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:5: Pushteti i Tij ësht ënë qiej dhe në Tokë, dhe te Perndia do të kthehen të gjitha!
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:6: Ai e shtie natën në ditë dhe ditën në natë, dhe ai e di mendimin e çdokujt!
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:7: Besoni Perëndinë dhe të Dërguarin e Tij dhe shpenzoni nga ato çka Ai ju ka lënë në dispozicion juve, se ata që kanë besuar nga ju dhe kanë shpenzuar (për të mirë), për ta ka shpërblim të madh!
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:8: Cka keni që nuk besoni në Perëndinë? E i Dërguari i Tij ju fton që ta besoni Zotin tuaj, kurse ai prej jush ka marrë obligimin – nëse dëshroni të jeni besimtarë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:9: Ai, robit të Vet i ka zbritur fakte të qarta për t’ju nxjerrë nga errësira në dritë – e Perëndia ndaj jush, me të vërtetë, është i mirë dhe i mëshirshëm.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:10: Dhe, ç’keni që nuk shpenzoni në rrugën e Perëndisë, pasi që qiejt dhe Toka i mbetën trashëgim Perëndisë? Nuk janë të barabartë ata që kanë shpenzuar dhe luftuan para fitores – dhe ata që kanë luftuar dhe shpenzuar pastaj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:11: Kush do t’i jap vullnetarisht Perëndisë hua – të mirë – që Ai pastaj t’ia kthejë shumëfish, e madje, për të ka shpërblim fisnik.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:12: në Ditën që do të shohish besimtarët dhe besimtaret, që para tyre dhe në të djahtë ecë dritë e tyre (e ju thuhet): “Gëzim (ka) sot për ju: kopshtet e xhennetit nëpër të cilët rrjedhin lumenjtë, në të cilët do të banoni përgjithmonë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:13: Në Ditën kur hipokritët dhe hipokritet do t’u flasin besimtarëve: “Pritna neve, që të shpërblehemi me dritën tuaj!” – u përgjigjet (atyre): “Kthehuni prapa, e kërkoni tjetër dritë!” Dhe, ndërmjet tyre do të vendose barriera (pengesa) që ka derë; brenda saj ka mëshirë, kurse jashtë saj ka vuajtje.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:14: A nuk kemi qenë me ju? – thërrasin ata.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:15: Sot, prej jush nuk pranohet kurrfarë kompensimi, e as prej atyre që nuk kanë besuar: zjarri është vendbanimi juaj, ai është për ju, e sa vendbanim i tmerrshëm që është ai!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:16: A nuk është koha që besimtarëve t’u zbutet zemra, kur përmendet Perëndia dhe e Vërteta (Kur’ani) që është reveluar (shpallur), dhe mos të bëhen ata sikur atyre që qysh më parë iu është dhënë Libri, por zemrat e tyre, me kalimin e një kohe të gjatë – u forcuan (në të keqe), dhe shumë prej tyre janë mëkatarë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:17: Dijeni, se Perëndia, me të vërtetë, e ngjallë tokën pas vdekjes së saj! Na ju sqarojmë argumentet për të kuptuar ju!
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:18: At dhe ato që japin lëmoshë dhe vullnetarisht i japin hua Perëndisë, do t’u kthehet shumëfish dhe për ta ka shpërblim fisnik.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:19: Ata që besojnë Perëndinë dhe profetët e Tij, ata janë njerëz të drejtë dhe dëshmitarë te Zoti i tyre dhe do të shpërblehen dhe do të kenë dritë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:20: Dijeni që jeta në këtë botë nuk është kurrgjë tjeër veçse lojë dhe dëfrim, dhe zbukurim (stolisje) dhe mburrje ndërmjet jush dhe vrapim kah pasuria dhe numri i fëmijëve! Kjo i shembëllen bimës, e cila pas hiut rritet dhe entuziazmon bujqit, e ajo pastaj gufon, po më vonë e sheh të zverdhur (vyshkur), që më në fund (të shkatërrohet).
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:21: Bëni gara që te Perëndia i juaj të meritoni amnestinë parajsën e gjerë sa qielli dhe Toka, që është e përgatitur për ata që i kanë besuar Perëndisë dhe profetëve të Tij.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:22: S’ka mjerim (fatkeqësi) që e godet Tokën dhe juve, përveç asaj që ëshë shënur më parë në Libër, - kjo për Perëndinë, me të vërtetë, është lehtë!
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:23: Për të mos u dëshpëruar për atë që ju ka kaluar, por edhe për të mos u gëzuar së tepërmi për atë që Ai ju ka dhënë juve, Perëndia nuk i don lavdëruesit dhe vetmburrësit,
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:24: ata që janë koprracë dhe nxisin edhe të tjerët në koprraci.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:25: Me të vërtetë, Ne i kemi dërguar profetët Tonë me argumente të qarta dhe me ta u kemi dhënë librin dhe terezitë, (drejtësinë): që njerëzit të veprojnë drejt; kurse hekurin e kemi krijuar, se, në atë ka tmerr të madh, po edhe dobi për njerëzit dhe që Perëndia të dëftojë ata që ndihmojnë besimin e Tij dhe të dërguarit e Tij – pa i parë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:26: Me të vërtetë, e kemi dërguar Nuhun dhe Ibrahimin dhe disa trashëgimtarë të tyre, që iu kemi shpallur profetninë dhe iu kemi dërguar Librin.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:27: Pastaj pas gjurmëve të tyre – ju kemi dërguar profetët Tonë, dhe pastaj kemi dërguar Isanë, të birin e Merjemës, të cilit ia dhamë Inxhilin, kurse në zemrat e ithtarëve të tij kemi mbjellë (frymëzuar) butësi dhe mëshirë, ndërsa, ata vetë e kanë trilluar jetën (lutëse – të tërhequr prej shoqërisë dhe jetës normale), për të arritur kënaqësinë e Perëndisë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:28: O ju besimtarë, - ruajuni Perëndisë dhe besoni Profetin e Tij, Ai do t’ju dhurojë mëshirë të dyfishtë, dhe do t’u japë dritë me ndihmën e së cilës do të ecni dhe do t’ju falë (gabimet); Perëndia është falës dhe mëshirues –
Efendi Nahi.verse 57:29: dhe le ta dinë ithtarët e Librit, se ata, kurrfarë dhuntie të Perëndisë nuk do të fitojnë (marrin), pasi që dhuntia është vetëm në dorën e Perëndisë – Ai ia dhuron kujt të dojë.

null.verse 57:1: Göylərdə və yerdə nə varsa, (hamısı) Allahı təqdis edib şə'ninə tə'riflər deməkdədir.
null.verse 57:2: Göylərin və yerin hökmü Onun əlindədir.
null.verse 57:3: Əvvəl də, axır da, zahir də, batin də Odur.
null.verse 57:4: Göyləri və yeri altı gündə xəlq edən, sonra ərşi yaradıb hökmü altına alan Odur.
null.verse 57:5: Göylərin və yerin hökmü Onun əlindədir.
null.verse 57:6: Gecəni gündüzə, gündüzü də gecəyə qatan Odur.
null.verse 57:7: (Ey insanlar!) Allaha və Peyğəmbərinə iman gətirin.
null.verse 57:8: Peyğəmbər sizi Rəbbinizə iman gətirməyə çağırdığı halda, sizə nə olub ki, Allaha iman gətirmirsiniz? Hələ bundan da əvvəl (Allah sizi ulu babanız Adəmin belində, yaxud ruhlar aləmində olduğunuz zaman yalnız Ona iman gətirəcəyiniz barəsində) sizdən əhd almışdı.
null.verse 57:9: Sizi zülmətlərdən nura (küfrdən imana) çıxartmaq üçün ?z bəndəsinə (Muhəmməd əleyhissəlama) açıq-aşkar ayələr nazil edən Odur.
null.verse 57:10: (Ey insanlar!) Sizə nə olub ki, (mal-dövlətinizi) Allah yolunda xərcləmirsiniz? Halbuki göylərin və yerin mirası (bütün sərvəti, eləcə də siz öləndən sonra qoyub gedəcəyiniz malın hamısı) ancaq Allahındır.
null.verse 57:11: Kimdir o kəs ki, Allah yolunda könül xoşluğu ilə borc versin, O da onun əvəzini qat-qat (birə on, yaxud birə yeddi yüz) artırsın?! Onu həm də çox qiymətli bir mükafat (Cənnət) gözləyir!
null.verse 57:12: O gün (qiyamət günü, ya Peyğəmbər!) mö'min kişilərin və qadınların (səmimi e'tiqadları və dünyada etdikləri yaxşı əməllər müqabilində nail olduqları iman) nurunun onların önlərindən və sağ tərəflərindən axıb şö'lə saçdığını (qıl körpüsü üstündə onlara yol göstərdiyini) görəcəksən.
null.verse 57:13: O gün münafiq kişi və qadınlar iman gətirənlərə: "(Bizi bir az) gözləyin ki, nurunuzdan bir qədər işıq alaq!" - deyəcəklər.
null.verse 57:14: (Münafiqlər divarın içəri tərəfində olan mö'minləri) səsləyib deyəcəklər: "Məgər biz (dünyada) sizinlə birlikdə deyildikmi?!" (Mö'minlər) belə cavab verəcəklər: "Bəli (bizimlə birlikdə idiniz).
null.verse 57:15: (Ey münafiqlər!) Bu gün artıq nə sizdən, nə də kafirlərdən (günahlarınızın bağışlanması üçün) heç bir fidyə qəbul olunmaz.
null.verse 57:16: İman gətirənlərin qəlblərinin Allahın zikri və haqdan nazil olan (Qur'an) üçün yumşalması vaxtı gəlib çatmadımı?! Onlar özlərindən əvvəl kitab verilən kimsələr (yəhudilər və xaçpərəstlər) kimi olmasınlar.
null.verse 57:17: (Ey insanlar!) Bilin ki, Allah torpağa öldükdən sonra təzədən can verir.
null.verse 57:18: Şübhəsiz ki, sədəqə verən kişi və qadınlar, Allah yolunda gözəl (könül xoşluğu ilə) borc verənlər üçün (əməllərinin savabı) qat-qat artırılacaqdır.
null.verse 57:19: Allaha və peyğəmbərinə iman gətirənlər - məhz onlar öz Rəbbi dərgahında olan siddiqlər (özündə-sözündə doğru olanlar) və şəhidlərdir.
null.verse 57:20: (Ey insanlar!) Bilin ki, dünya həyatı oyun-oyuncaq, bər-bəzək, bir-birinizin qarşısında öyünmək və mal-dövləti, oğul-uşağı çoxaltmaqdan ibarətdir.
null.verse 57:21: (Ey insanlar!) Rəbbiniz tərəfindən bağışlanmağa və genişliyi yerlə göyün genişliyi qədər olan, Allaha və Onun peyğəmbərlərinə iman gətirənlərdən ötrü hazırlanmış Cənnətə nail olmaq üçün (yaxşı əməllər etməkdə) bir-birinizi ötüb keçməyə çalışın.
null.verse 57:22: Yer üzündə baş verən və sizin öz başınıza gələn elə bir müsibət yoxdur ki, Biz onu yaratmamışdan əvvəl o, bir kitabda (lövhi-məhfuzda) yazılmamış olsun.
null.verse 57:23: Bu sizin əlinizdən çıxana kədərlənməməyiniz və sizə də verilənə sevinib qürrələnməməyiniz üçündür.
null.verse 57:24: O kəslər ki, həm özləri xəsislik edər, həm də xalqa xəsis olmağı əmr edərlər.
null.verse 57:25: And olsun ki, Biz peyğəmbərlərimizi açıq-aşkar dəlillərlə (mö'cüzələrlə) göndərdik.
null.verse 57:26: And olsun ki, Biz Nuhu və İbrahimi (peyğəmbər) göndərdik, peyğəmbərliyi və kitabı (Tövratı, Zəburu, İncili və Qur'anı) onların nəslinə verdik.
null.verse 57:27: Sonra onların ardınca (Musa, İlyas, Davud, Süleyman, Yunis və başqa) peyğəmbərlərimizi yolladıq.
null.verse 57:28: Ey iman gətirənlər! Allahdan qorxun və Onun peyğəmbərinə iman gətirin ki, (Allah) sizə ?z mərhəmətindən iki pay versin, sizə (qıl körpüsü üstündə) getməyiniz üçün nur bəxş etsin və sizi bağışlasın.
null.verse 57:29: (Muhəmməd əleyhissəlama iman gətirməyən) kitab əhli bilsin ki, onlar Allahın lütfünə (mərhəmətinə, dilədiyi kimsəyə peyğəmbərlik əta etməsinə) heç bir vəchlə mane ola bilməzlər.

null.verse 57:1: Allaha hvali sve što je na nebesima i na Zemlji, i On je Silni i Mudri.
null.verse 57:2: Njegova je vlast na nebesima i na Zemlji; On život i smrt daje, i On sve može.
null.verse 57:3: On je Prvi i Posljednji, i Vidljivi i Nevidljivi; i On zna sve!
null.verse 57:4: U šest vremenskih razdoblja On je nebesa i Zemlju stvorio, i onda svemirom zavladao; On zna šta u zemlju ulazi i šta iz nje izlazi i šta s neba silazi i šta se prema njemu diže, on je s vama gdje god bili, i sve što radi
null.verse 57:5: Njegova je vlast na nebesima i na Zemlji, i Allahu će se sve vratiti!
null.verse 57:6: On uvodi noć u dan i dan u noć, i On zna svačije misli.
null.verse 57:7: Vjerujte u Allaha i Poslanika Njegova i udjeljujte iz onoga što vam On stavlja na raspolaganje, jer one od vas koji budu vjerovali i udjeljivali čeka nagrada velika.
null.verse 57:8: Šta vam je pa ne vjerujete u Allaha? Poslanik vas zove da vjerujete u Gospodara svoga - a On je od vas već zavjet uzeo - ako želite biti vjernici.
null.verse 57:9: On robu Svome objavljuje jasne ajete da bi vas iz tmina na svjetlo izveo - a Allah je, uistinu, prema vama dobar i milostiv.
null.verse 57:10: I šta vam je pa odbijate da trošite na Allahovu putu kada će Allah nebesa i Zemlju naslijediti? Nisu jednaki među vama koji su davali priloge prije pobjede i lično se borili - oni su na višem stupnju od onih koji su poslije d
null.verse 57:11: Ko će Allahu drage volje zajam dati da bi mu ga On mnogostruko vratio, a uz to i nagradu plemenitu dobio
null.verse 57:12: na Dan kada budeš vidio kako se pred vjernicima i vjernicama, i s desne strane njihove, svjetlo njihovo bude kretalo: "Blago vama danas: džennetske bašče kroz koje teku rijeke u kojima ćete vječno boraviti - to je veliki uspj
null.verse 57:13: na Dan kada će licemjeri i licemjerke vjernicima govoriti: "Pričekajte nas da se svjetlom vašim poslužimo!" "Vratite se natrag, pa drugo svjetlo potražite!" - reći će se.
null.verse 57:14: Zar nismo s vama bili? - dozivaće ih.
null.verse 57:15: Nikakva otkupnina se danas od vas neće primiti, a ni od onih koji nisu vjerovali; vatra će biti prebivalište vaše, ona baš vama odgovara, a užasno je ona boravište!"
null.verse 57:16: Zar nije vrijeme da se vjernicima srca smekšaju kad se Allah i Istina koja se objavljuje spomene, i da oni ne budu kao oni kojima je još davno data Knjiga, pa su srca njihova, zato što je proteklo mnogo vremena, postala nemilosrdna, i mnogi
null.verse 57:17: Znajte da Allah daje život već mrtvoj zemlji! Mi vam objašnjavamo dokaze da biste razumjeli.
null.verse 57:18: Onima koji milostinju budu udjeljivali i onima koje je budu udjeljivale, i koji drage volje Allahu budu zajam davali - mnogostruko će se vratiti i njih čeka nagrada plemenita.
null.verse 57:19: Oni koji u Allaha i poslanike Njegove budu vjerovali imaće u Gospodara svoga stepen pravednika i mučenika i dobiće nagradu kao i oni i svjetlo kao i oni; a oni koji ne budu vjerovali i dokaze Naše budu poricali biće stanovnici u v
null.verse 57:20: Znajte da život na ovome svijetu nije ništa drugo do igra, i razonoda, i uljepšavanje, i međusobno hvalisanje i nadmetanje imecima i brojem djece! Primjer za to je bilje čiji rast poslije kiše oduševljava nevjernike, ono
null.verse 57:21: Nedmećite se da u Gospodara svoga zaslužite oprost i Džennet, prostran koliko su nebo i Zemlja prostrani, i pripremljen za one koji u Allaha i poslanike Njegove vjeruju.
null.verse 57:22: Nema nevolje koja zadesi Zemlju i vas, a koja nije, prije nego što je damo, zapisana u Knjizi - to je Allahu, uistinu, lahko -
null.verse 57:23: da ne biste tugovali za onim što vam je promaklo, a i da se ne biste previše radovali onome što vam On dade.
null.verse 57:24: koji škrtare i od ljudi škrtost traže.
null.verse 57:25: Mi smo izaslanike naše s jasnim dokazima slali i po njima knjige i terazije objavljivali, da bi ljudi pravedno postupali - a gvožđe smo stvorili, u kome je velika snaga i koje ljudima koristi - i da bi Allah ukazao na one koji pomažu v
null.verse 57:26: Mi smo Nuha i Ibrahima poslali i nekima od potomaka njihovih vjerovjesništvo i objavu dali; neki od potomaka njihovih su na Pravome putu, a mnogi od njih su nevjernici.
null.verse 57:27: Zatim smo, poslije njih, jednog za drugim naše poslanike slali, dok nismo Isaa, sina Merjemina, poslali, kojem smo Indžil dali, a u srca sljedbenika njegovih smo blagost i samilost ulili, dok su monaštvo oni sami, kao novotariju, uveli - Mi
null.verse 57:28: O vi koji vjerujete, Allaha se bojte i u Poslanika Njegova vjerujte, On će vam dvostruku milost Svoju darovati, i daće vam svjetlo pomoću kog ćete ići, i oprostiće vam - jer Allah prašta, i samilostan je -
null.verse 57:29: i neka sljedbenici Knjige znaju da oni nikakvu Allahovu blagodat neće dobiti, jer je blagodat samo u Allahovoj ruci - daje je onome kome On hoće; a u Allaha je blagodat najveća.

null.verse 57:1: নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলে যা কিছু আছে, সবাই আল্লাহর পবিত্রতা ঘোষণা করে। তিনি শক্তিধর; প্রজ্ঞাময়।
null.verse 57:2: নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলের রাজত্ব তাঁরই। তিনি জীবন দান করেন ও মৃত্যু ঘটান। তিনি সবকিছু করতে সক্ষম।
null.verse 57:3: তিনিই প্রথম, তিনিই সর্বশেষ, তিনিই প্রকাশমান ও অপ্রকাশমান এবং তিনি সব বিষয়ে সম্যক পরিজ্ঞাত।
null.verse 57:4: তিনি নভোমন্ডল ও ভূ-মন্ডল সৃষ্টি করেছেন ছয়দিনে, অতঃপর আরশের উপর সমাসীন হয়েছেন। তিনি জানেন যা ভূমিতে প্রবেশ করে ও যা ভূমি থেকে নির্গত হয় এবং যা আকাশ থেকে বর্ষিত হয় ও যা আকাশে উত্থিত হয়। তিনি তোমাদের সাথে আছেন তোমরা যেখানেই থাক। তোমরা যা কর, আল্লাহ তা দেখেন।
null.verse 57:5: নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলের রাজত্ব তাঁরই। সবকিছু তাঁরই দিকে প্রত্যাবর্তন করবে।
null.verse 57:6: তিনি রাত্রিকে দিবসে প্রবিষ্ট করেন এবং দিবসকে প্রবিষ্ট করেন রাত্রিতে। তিনি অন্তরের বিষয়াদি সম্পর্কেও সম্যক জ্ঞাত।
null.verse 57:7: তোমরা আল্লাহ ও তাঁর রসূলের প্রতি বিশ্বাস স্থাপন কর এবং তিনি তোমাদেরকে যার উত্তরাধিকারী করেছেন, তা থেকে ব্যয় কর। অতএব, তোমাদের মধ্যে যারা বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করে ও ব্যয় করে, তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে মহাপুরস্কার।
null.verse 57:8: তোমাদের কি হল যে, তোমরা আল্লাহর প্রতি বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করছ না, অথচ রসূল তোমাদেরকে তোমাদের পালনকর্তার প্রতি বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করার দাওয়াত দিচ্ছেন? আল্লাহ তো পূর্বেই তোমাদের অঙ্গীকার নিয়েছেন-যদি তোমরা বিশ্বাসী হও।
null.verse 57:9: তিনিই তাঁর দাসের প্রতি প্রকাশ্য আয়াত অবতীর্ণ করেন, যাতে তোমাদেরকে অন্ধকার থেকে আলোকে আনয়ন করেন। নিশ্চয় আল্লাহ তোমাদের প্রতি করুণাময়, পরম দয়ালু।
null.verse 57:10: তোমাদেরকে আল্লাহর পথে ব্যয় করতে কিসে বাধা দেয়, যখন আল্লাহই নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলের উত্তরাধিকারী? তোমাদের মধ্যে যে মক্কা বিজয়ের পূর্বে ব্যয় করেছে ও জেহাদ করেছে, সে সমান নয়। এরূপ লোকদের মর্যদা বড় তাদের অপেক্ষা, যার পরে ব্যয় করেছে ও জেহাদ করেছে। তবে আল্লাহ উভয়কে কল্যাণের ওয়াদা দিয়েছেন। তোমরা যা কর, আল্লাহ সে সম্পর্কে সম্যক জ্ঞাত।
null.verse 57:11: কে সেই ব্যক্তি, যে আল্লাহকে উত্তম ধার দিবে, এরপর তিনি তার জন্যে তা বহুগুণে বৃদ্ধি করবেন এবং তার জন্যে রয়েছে সম্মানিত পুরস্কার।
null.verse 57:12: যেদিন আপনি দেখবেন ঈমানদার পুরুষ ও ঈমানদার নারীদেরকে, তাদের সম্মুখ ভাগে ও ডানপার্শ্বে তাদের জ্যোতি ছুটোছুটি করবে বলা হবেঃ আজ তোমাদের জন্যে সুসংবাদ জান্নাতের, যার তলদেশে নদী প্রবাহিত, তাতে তারা চিরকাল থাকবে। এটাই মহাসাফল্য।
null.verse 57:13: যেদিন কপট বিশ্বাসী পুরুষ ও কপট বিশ্বাসিনী নারীরা মুমিনদেরকে বলবেঃ তোমরা আমাদের জন্যে অপেক্ষা কর, আমরাও কিছু আলো নিব তোমাদের জ্যোতি থেকে। বলা হবেঃ তোমরা পিছনে ফিরে যাও ও আলোর খোঁজ কর। অতঃপর উভয় দলের মাঝখানে খাড়া করা হবে একটি প্রাচীর, যার একটি দরজা হবে। তার অভ্যন্তরে থাকবে রহমত এবং বাইরে থাকবে আযাব।
null.verse 57:14: তারা মুমিনদেরকে ডেকে বলবেঃ আমরা কি তোমাদের সাথে ছিলাম না? তারা বলবেঃ হঁ্যা কিন্তু তোমরা নিজেরাই নিজেদেরকে বিপদগ্রস্ত করেছ। প্রতীক্ষা করেছ, সন্দেহ পোষণ করেছ এবং অলীক আশার পেছনে বিভ্রান্ত হয়েছ, অবশেষে আল্লাহর আদেশ পৌঁছেছে। এই সবই তোমাদেরকে আল্লাহ সম্পর্কে প্রতারিত করেছে।
null.verse 57:15: অতএব, আজ তোমাদের কাছ থেকে কোন মুক্তিপন গ্রহণ করা হবে না। এবং কাফেরদের কাছ থেকেও নয়। তোমাদের সবার আবাস্থল জাহান্নাম। সেটাই তোমাদের সঙ্গী। কতই না নিকৃষ্ট এই প্রত্যাবর্তন স্থল।
null.verse 57:16: যারা মুমিন, তাদের জন্যে কি আল্লাহর স্মরণে এবং যে সত্য অবর্তীর্ণ হয়েছে, তার কারণে হৃদয় বিগলিত হওয়ার সময় আসেনি? তারা তাদের মত যেন না হয়, যাদেরকে পূর্বে কিতাব দেয়া হয়েছিল। তাদের উপর সুদীর্ঘকাল অতিক্রান্ত হয়েছে, অতঃপর তাদের অন্তঃকরণ কঠিন হয়ে গেছে। তাদের অধিকাংশই পাপাচারী।
null.verse 57:17: তোমরা জেনে রাখ, আল্লাহই ভূ-ভাগকে তার মৃত্যুর পর পুনরুজ্জীবিত করেন। আমি পরিস্কারভাবে তোমাদের জন্যে আয়াতগুলো ব্যক্ত করেছি, যাতে তোমরা বোঝ।
null.verse 57:18: নিশ্চয় দানশীল ব্যক্তি ও দানশীলা নারী, যারা আল্লাহকে উত্তমরূপে ধার দেয়, তাদেরকে দেয়া হবে বহুগুণ এবং তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে সম্মানজনক পুরস্কার।
null.verse 57:19: আর যারা আল্লাহ ও তাঁর রসূলের প্রতি বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করে তারাই তাদের পালনকর্তার কাছে সিদ্দীক ও শহীদ বলে বিবেচিত। তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে পুরস্কার ও জ্যোতি এবং যারা কাফের ও আমার নিদর্শন অস্বীকারকারী তারাই জাহান্নামের অধিবাসী হবে।
null.verse 57:20: তোমরা জেনে রাখ, পার্থিব জীবন ক্রীড়া-কৌতুক, সাজ-সজ্জা, পারস্পরিক অহমিকা এবং ধন ও জনের প্রাচুর্য ব্যতীত আর কিছু নয়, যেমন এক বৃষ্টির অবস্থা, যার সবুজ ফসল কৃষকদেরকে চমৎকৃত করে, এরপর তা শুকিয়ে যায়, ফলে তুমি তাকে পীতবর্ণ দেখতে পাও, এরপর তা খড়কুটা হয়ে যায়। আর পরকালে আছে কঠিন শাস্তি এবং আল্লাহর ক্ষমা ও সন্তুষ্টি। পার্থিব জীবন প্রতারণার উপকরণ বৈ কিছু নয়।
null.verse 57:21: তোমরা অগ্রে ধাবিত হও তোমাদের পালনকর্তার ক্ষমা ও সেই জান্নাতের দিকে, যা আকাশ ও পৃথিবীর মত প্রশস্ত। এটা প্রস্তুত করা হয়েছে আল্লাহ ও তাঁর রসূলগণের প্রতি বিশ্বাসস্থাপনকারীদের জন্যে। এটা আল্লাহর কৃপা, তিনি যাকে ইচ্ছা, এটা দান করেন। আল্লাহ মহান কৃপার অধিকারী।
null.verse 57:22: পৃথিবীতে এবং ব্যক্তিগতভাবে তোমাদের উপর কোন বিপদ আসে না; কিন্তু তা জগত সৃষ্টির পূর্বেই কিতাবে লিপিবদ্ধ আছে। নিশ্চয় এটা আল্লাহর পক্ষে সহজ।
null.verse 57:23: এটা এজন্যে বলা হয়, যাতে তোমরা যা হারাও তজ্জন্যে দুঃখিত না হও এবং তিনি তোমাদেরকে যা দিয়েছেন, তজ্জন্যে উল্লসিত না হও। আল্লাহ কোন উদ্ধত অহংকারীকে পছন্দ করেন না,
null.verse 57:24: যারা কৃপণতা করে এবং মানুষকে কৃপণতার প্রতি উৎসাহ দেয়, যে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নেয়, তার জানা উচিত যে, আল্লাহ অভাবমুক্ত, প্রশংসিত।
null.verse 57:25: আমি আমার রসূলগণকে সুস্পষ্ট নিদর্শনসহ প্রেরণ করেছি এবং তাঁদের সাথে অবতীর্ণ করেছি কিতাব ও ন্যায়নীতি, যাতে মানুষ ইনসাফ প্রতিষ্ঠা করে। আর আমি নাযিল করেছি লৌহ, যাতে আছে প্রচন্ড রণশক্তি এবং মানুষের বহুবিধ উপকার। এটা এজন্যে যে, আল্লাহ জেনে নিবেন কে না দেখে তাঁকে ও তাঁর রসূলগণকে সাহায্য করে। আল্লাহ শক্তিধর, পরাক্রমশালী।
null.verse 57:26: আমি নূহ ও ইব্রাহীমকে রসূলরূপে প্রেরণ করেছি এবং তাদের বংশধরের মধ্যে নবুওয়ত ও কিতাব অব্যাহত রেখেছি। অতঃপর তাদের কতক সৎপথপ্রাপ্ত হয়েছে এবং অধিকাংশই হয়েছে পাপাচারী।
null.verse 57:27: অতঃপর আমি তাদের পশ্চাতে প্রেরণ করেছি আমার রসূলগণকে এবং তাদের অনুগামী করেছি মরিয়ম তনয় ঈসাকে ও তাকে দিয়েছি ইঞ্জিল। আমি তার অনুসারীদের অন্তরে স্থাপন করেছি নম্রতা ও দয়া। আর বৈরাগ্য, সে তো তারা নিজেরাই উদ্ভাবন করেছে; আমি এটা তাদের উপর ফরজ করিনি; কিন্তু তারা আল্লাহর সন্তুষ্টি লাভের জন্যে এটা অবলম্বন করেছে। অতঃপর তারা যথাযথভাবে তা পালন করেনি। তাদের মধ্যে যারা বিশ্বাসী ছিল, আমি তাদেরকে তাদের প্রাপ্য পুরস্কার দিয়েছি। আর তাদের অধিকাংশই পাপাচারী।
null.verse 57:28: মুমিনগণ, তোমরা আল্লাহকে ভয় কর এবং তাঁর রসূলের প্রতি বিশ্বাস স্থাপন কর। তিনি নিজে অনুগ্রহের দ্বিগুণ অংশ তোমাদেরকে দিবেন, তোমাদেরকে দিবেন জ্যোতি, যার সাহায্যে তোমরা চলবে এবং তোমাদেরকে ক্ষমা করবেন। আল্লাহ ক্ষমাশীল, দয়াময়।
null.verse 57:29: যাতে কিতাবধারীরা জানে যে, আল্লাহর সামান্য অনুগ্রহের উপর ও তাদের কোন ক্ষমতা নেই, দয়া আল্লাহরই হাতে; তিনি যাকে ইচ্ছা, তা দান করেন। আল্লাহ মহা অনুগ্রহশীল। দয়াময়।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:1: Всичко на небесата и всичко на земята прославя Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:2: Негова е властта на небесата и на земята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:3: Той е Изначалния и Безкрайния, и Явния, и Скрития.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:4: Той е, Който сътвори небесата и земята в шест дни, после се въздигна
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:6: Негово е владението на небесата и на земята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:7: Той въвежда нощта в деня и въвежда деня в нощта.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:8: Вярвайте в Аллах и в Неговия Пратеник, и раздавайте от онова, на което ви стори Той наследници! За онези от вас, които вярват и раздават, за тях ще има голяма награда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:9: И какво ви е, защо да не повярвате в Аллах, когато Пратеника ви зове да повярвате във вашия Господ, и Той вече получи вашия обет, ако сте вярващи?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:10: Той е, Който низпослава на Своя раб ясни знамения, за да ви изведе от тъмнините към светлината.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:11: И какво ви е, защо да не раздавате по пътя на Аллах? На Аллах принадлежи наследството на небесата и на земята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:12: На онзи, който дава хубав заем [по пътя] на Аллах Той ще му го умножи и за него ще има щедра награда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:13: В Деня, когато видиш вярващите мъже и жени с тяхната светлина, устремена пред тях, и в десниците им [тогава ще им се каже:] Радостната вест за вас Днес са Градините, сред които реки текат.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:14: В този Ден лицемерите и лицемерките ще кажат на вярващите: Почакайте ни, за да придобием от вашата светлина! Ще им бъде казано: Върнете се назад и търсете светлина! И ще се въздигне между тях стена с врата.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:15: Ще им се прогласи: Не бяхме ли с вас? Ще кажат :
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:16: Да, наистина, ала ви изкусиха вашите души и дебнехте, и се съмнявахте, и ви подмамиха вашите мечти, докато се яви повелята на Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:18: Днес не ще бъде взет откуп нито от вас, нито от онези, които не повярваха.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:19: Не е ли настъпило за вярващите време сърцата им да се смирят при споменаването на Аллах и пред истината, която бе низпослана, и да не станат като дарените с Писанието преди, за които срокът бе дълъг, и закоравяха сърцата им, и мнозина от тях бяха нечестив
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:20: Знайте, че Аллах съживява земята след нейната смърт! Разясняваме ви знаменията, за да проумеете!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:21: На раздаващите милостиня мъже и жени, които дават хубав заем на Аллах, ще им бъде умножено и ще има за тях щедра награда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:22: Онези, които вярват в Аллах и в Неговите пратеници, те са всеправдивите и мъчениците.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:23: Знайте, че земният живот е само игра и забава, и украса, и хвалба между вас, и умножаване на имотите и децата, подобно на растения след дъжд - възхищават сеячите, после изсъхват и ги виждаш пожълтели, после стават на съчки.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:24: Надпреварвайте се към опрощение от вашия Господ и към Градината с ширина, колкото ширината на небето и на земята, приготвена за онези, които повярваха в Аллах и в Неговите пратеници! Това е благодатта на Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:25: Не се случва беда, преди да сме я породили, нито на земята, нито с вас самите, без да е
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:27: За да не страдате за онова, което ви се е изплъзнало и да не ликувате за онова, което ви е дошло.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:28: които се скъпят и повеляват на хората скъперничество.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:29: Изпратихме Нашите пратеници с ясните знаци и низпослахме заедно с тях Книгата и везната, за да постъпват хората справедливо.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:30: И изпратихме Нух и Ибрахим, и отредихме сред тяхното потомство да бъдат пророчеството и Писанието.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:31: Сетне проводихме по стъпките им Нашите пратеници, и проводихме след тях Иса, сина на Мариам, и му дадохме Евангелието, и вложихме в сърцата на онези, които го последваха, състрадание и милосърдие.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:32: О, вярващи, бойте се от Аллах и вярвайте в Неговия Пратеник! Той ще ви даде двоен дял от Своята милост.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 57:33: За да узнаят хората на Писанието, че нямат власт над нищо от благодатта на Аллах и че благодатта е в Ръката на Аллах.

null.verse 57:1: 天地萬物，都讚頌真主超絕萬物，他確是萬能的，確是至睿的。
null.verse 57:2: 天地的國權，歸他所有；他能使人生，能使人死；他對於萬事，是全能的。
null.verse 57:3: 他是前無始後無終的，是極顯著極隱微的，他是全知萬物的。
null.verse 57:4: 他是在六日內創造天地，然後升上寶座的。他知道潛入地中的，和從地中生出的，與從天空降下的，和升上天空的。無論你們在哪裡，他是與你們同在的；他是鑒察你們的行為的。
null.verse 57:5: 天地的國權，歸他所有；萬事只歸於真主。
null.verse 57:6: 他使黑夜侵入白晝，使白晝侵入黑夜；他是全知心事的。
null.verse 57:7: 你們應當信仰真主和使者，你們應當分捨他所委你們代管的財產，你們中信道而且施捨者，將受重大的服酬。
null.verse 57:8: 你們怎麼不信仰真主呢？使者號召你們去信仰你們的主，而你們的主，確已和你們締約，如果你們要信道，就趕快信吧！
null.verse 57:9: 他降示他的僕人許多明証，以便他使你們從重重黑暗走入光明。真主對於你們，確是仁愛的，確是至慈的。
null.verse 57:10: 你們怎麼不為真主而施捨呢？天地的遺產，只是真主的。你們中在勝利之前施捨而且參戰者，與在勝利之後施捨而且參戰者，不是平等的，前者比後者品級更高。真主以最優的報酬應許每派人，真主是徹知你們的行為的。
null.verse 57:11: 誰以善債借給真主呢？真主將加倍償還他，他還受優厚的報酬。
null.verse 57:12: 在那日，你將看見男女信士們，他們的光輝，在他們的前面和右邊奔馳，有人將對他們說：「你們今日的佳音，是下臨諸河的樂園；你們將永居其中，那確是偉大的成功。」
null.verse 57:13: 在那日，偽信的男女，將對信道的男女說：「請你們等候我們，讓我們借你們的一點光輝！」有人將要對他們說：「你們轉回去尋求光輝吧！」於是，彼此之間，築起了一堵隔壁來，隔壁上有一道門，門內有恩惠，門外有刑罰。
null.verse 57:14: 他們將喊叫信道的人們說：「難道我們與你們不是同道嗎？」他們說：「不然，你們自欺、觀望、懷疑正道，種種妄想，欺騙你們，直到真主的命令來臨，猾賊曾以真主的優容欺騙你們。
null.verse 57:15: 故今日你們與不信道者的罰金，都不被接受，你們的歸宿是火獄，那對於你們是更相宜的，那歸宿真惡劣！」
null.verse 57:16: 難道信士們以為時間還未到，故他們的心不為真主的教誨和他所降示的真理而柔和嗎？他們不可以像以前曾奉天經的人們那樣，經過長時期後，他們的心就變硬了，他們中有許多人是犯罪的。
null.verse 57:17: 你們應當知道真主是使已死的大地復活的，我確已為你們解釋了許多蹟象，以便你們明理。
null.verse 57:18: 施財的士女，和以善債借給真主的士女，他必定加倍償還他們，他們將受優厚的報酬。
null.verse 57:19: 信仰真主和使者的人們，在主那裡，是虔誠者，是見証者，他們將有他們的報酬和光明。不信正道並且否認我的蹟象的人們，是火獄的居民。
null.verse 57:20: 你們應當知道：今世生活，只是游戲、娛樂、點綴、矜誇、以財產和子孫的富庶相爭勝；譬如時雨，使田苗滋長，農夫見了非常高興，嗣後，田苗枯槁，你看它變成黃色的，繼而零落。在後世，有嚴厲的刑罰，也有從真主發出的赦宥和喜悅；今世生活，只是欺騙人的享受。
null.verse 57:21: 你們應當爭取從你們的主發出的赦宥，和與天地一樣廣闊的樂園——為信仰真主和眾使者的人們而準備的樂園——那是真主的恩典，他將它賞賜他所意欲者。真主是有宏恩的。
null.verse 57:22: 大地上所有的災難，和你們自己所遭的禍患，在我創造那些禍患之前，無不記錄在天經中；這事對於真主確是容易的，
null.verse 57:23: 以免你們為自己所喪失的而悲傷，為他所賞賜你們的而狂喜。真主是不喜愛一切傲慢者、矜誇者的。
null.verse 57:24: 他們自己吝嗇，還教別人吝嗇。規避義務的人們，真主確是無求於他們的，確是可頌的。
null.verse 57:25: 我確已派遣我的眾使者，去傳達我的許多明証，並降示天經和公平，以便眾人謹守公道。我曾創造鋼鐵，其中有嚴厲的刑罰，對於眾人，有許多裨益；以便真主知道在秘密中相助他和他的眾使者的人。真主確是至剛的，確是萬能的。
null.verse 57:26: 我確已派遣努哈和易卜拉欣，我以預言和天經賞賜他們倆的後裔；他們中有遵循正道的，他們中有許多人是悖逆的。
null.verse 57:27: 在他們之後，我曾繼續派遣我的眾使者，我又繼續派遣麥爾彥之子爾撒，我賞賜他《引支勒》，我使他的信徒們心懷仁愛和慈憫。他們自創出家制——我未曾以出家為他們的定制——他們創設此制，以求真主的喜悅；但他們未曾切實的遵守它，故我把報酬賞賜他們中的信道者。他們中有許多人是悖逆的。
null.verse 57:28: 信仰爾撒的人們啊！你們應當敬畏真主，應當信仰他的使者，他就把他的恩惠加倍賞賜你們，他就為你們創造一道光明；你們將借那道光明而行走，他就赦宥你們。真主是至赦的，是至慈的。
null.verse 57:29: 以便曾受天經的人們知道，他們簡直不能操縱真主的恩典，並且知道，凡恩典都在真主的掌握中，他要賞賜誰，就賞賜誰，真主是有宏恩的。 信仰爾撒的人們啊！你們應當敬畏真主，應當信仰他的使者，他就把他的恩惠加倍賞賜你們，他就為你們創造一道光明；你們將借那道光明而行走，他就赦宥你們。真主是至赦的，是至慈的。

null.verse 57:1: Chválí Boha vše, co na nebesích je i na zemi - a On mocný je i moudrý.
null.verse 57:2: Jemu náleží království nebes i země a On život i smrt dává a On všech věcí je mocný.
null.verse 57:3: On počátkem je i koncem, zjevný i skrytý; On o každé věci je vševědoucí.
null.verse 57:4: On je ten, jenž stvořil nebesa i zemi v šesti dnech a potom se na trůnu Svém usadil.
null.verse 57:5: Jemu náleží království nebes i země a k Bohu se rozkazy všechny navracejí.
null.verse 57:6: On dává přejít noci v den a dni v noc a On dobře zná vše, co v hrudích se skrývá.
null.verse 57:7: Věřte v Boha a posla Jeho a rozdávejte z toho, v čem učinil vás posledními vlastníky! Těm z vás, kdož uvěřili a almužnu rozdávali, je určena odměna veliká.
null.verse 57:8: Co je s vámi, že nechcete v Boha uvěřit, když posel Jeho vás vyzývá, abyste uvěřili v Pána svého, a když již On s vámi uzavřel smlouvu - jste-li vskutku věřící?
null.verse 57:9: On je ten, jenž seslal služebníku Svému znamení jasná, aby vás vyvedl z temnot ke světlu.
null.verse 57:10: Co je s vámi, že nechcete rozdávat na cestě Boží, když Bohu přece připadne dědictví nebes a země? Ti z vás, kdož rozdávali a bojovali ještě před vítězstvím, nejsou stejní jako ti, kdož vyčkávali; ti první jsou mnohem výše na stupních než ti, kdo rozdávali a bojovali až po něm.
null.verse 57:11: Kdo tedy bude tím, jenž poskytne Bohu krásnou půjčku, aby mu ji Bůh dvojnásobně splatil a dostalo se mu odměny veliké?
null.verse 57:12: V den, kdy spatříš, jak před věřícími muži a ženami a po pravici jejich poběží světlo jejich, bude jim řečeno: "Radostná zpráva pro vás: dnes vstoupíte do zahrad, pod nimiž řeky tekou a v nichž nesmrtelní budete!" A to věru bude úspěch nesmírný.
null.verse 57:13: V ten den řeknou pokrytci, muži i ženy, těm, kdož uvěřili:,, Počkejte na nás, abychom si mohli vzít něco ze světla vašeho!" A bude jim řečeno: "Vraťte se nazpět a hledejte světlo jinde!" A bude mezi nimi postavena zeď, v níž bude brána: uvnitř bude milosrdenství a zvnějška, naproti nim, bude trest.
null.verse 57:14: A zavolají na ně pokrytci: "Cožpak jsme nebyli s vámi?" Odpovědí: "Ano, avšak vy sami sebe jste v pokušení uvedli, číhali jste, pochybovali jste a zmámily vás vaše tužby pozemské, až přišel rozkaz Boží a byli jste oklamáni ohledně Boha tím, kdo mámí.
null.verse 57:15: A nebude proto dnes přijato výkupné ani od vás, ani od těch, kdož nevěřili; útulkem vaším bude oheň pekelný a bude i vaším pánem.
null.verse 57:16: Což nepřišel čas pro ty, kdož uvěřili, aby srdce jejich se pokořila před připomenutím Božím a před tím, co seslal z pravdy? Nechť nejsou jako ti, jimž zdál se - když dostalo se jim předtím Písma - čas příliš dlouhý; i zatvrdila se srdce jejich a většina z nich byli hanebníci.
null.verse 57:17: Vězte, že Bůh oživuje zemi po smrti její; a již jsme vám vysvětlili znamení - snad budete rozumní!
null.verse 57:18: Těm, kdož rozdávají almužnu, mužům i ženám, a těm, kdož poskytují Bohu krásnou půjčku, těm bude splacena dvojnásobně a dostane se jim odměny štědré.
null.verse 57:19: Věru ti, kdož uvěřili v Boha a posly Jeho, jsou spravedliví a svědky před Pánem svým; jim dostane se jejich odměny a jejich světla.
null.verse 57:20: Vězte, že život pozemský je pouze hra a zábava, marná okrasa, vzájemné vychloubání mezi vámi a soupeření v rozmnožování majetku a dětí.
null.verse 57:21: Předstihujte se tedy, abyste dosáhli odpuštění Pána svého a zahrady, jejíž šíře se rovná nebi i zemi, připravené pro ty, kdož v Boha a posly Jeho uvěřili.
null.verse 57:22: A nepostihne žádné neštěstí zemi ani osoby vaše, aby nebylo zaneseno v Knize dříve, než jsme je stvořili - a to věru je pro Boha nadmíru snadné.
null.verse 57:23: A jedná tak, abyste si nezoufali nad tím, co vám uniklo, a abyste se neradovali příliš z toho, čeho se vám dostalo.
null.verse 57:24: ani ty, kdož lakotí a lidem lakotu doporučují.
null.verse 57:25: A vyslali jsme již posly s důkazy jasnými a seslali jsme s nimi Písmo a váhu, aby lidé jednali poctivě a seslali jsme také železo, v němž nebezpečí je strašné i užitek pro lidi - aby Bůh poznal ty, kdož pomáhají Jemu i poslům Jeho v tajnosti.
null.verse 57:26: A vyslali jsme již Noema a Abrahama a vložili jsme do potomstva jejich prorocké poslání i Písmo; a někteří z nich byli na cestě správné, avšak mnozí z nich byli hanebníci.
null.verse 57:27: A potom jsme vypravili v jejich stopách jiné posly své a vypravili jsme Ježíše, syna Mariina, a dali jsme mu Evangelium a vložili do srdcí těch, kdož jej následovali, mírnost a slitování; a mnišství si oni zavedli jako novotu - a nepředepsali jsme jim je - usilujíce zalíbit se Bohu.
null.verse 57:28: Vy, kteří věříte! Bojte se Boha a věřte v posla Jeho! On dá vám dva podíly z milosrdenství Svého a uštědří vám světlo, s nímž půjdete, a odpustí vám - vždyť Bůh je odpouštějící, slitovný,
null.verse 57:29: aby poznali vlastníci Písma, že nemají moci nad ničím z přízně Boží a že přízeň je jedině v rukou Božích; z ní dává, komu chce.

null.verse 57:1: Wat er ook in de hemelen en op aarde is, verheerlijkt God; Hij is de Almachtige, de Alwijze.
null.verse 57:2: Van Hem is het koninkrijk der hemelen en der aarde.
null.verse 57:3: Hij is de Eerste en de Laatste, de Zich Manifesterende en de Verborgene, en Hij heeft kennis van alle dingen.
null.verse 57:4: Hij is het Die de hemelen en de aarde in zes dagen schiep; daarna zette Hij zich op de Troon neder.
null.verse 57:5: Van Hem is het koninkrijk der hemelen en der aarde en naar God worden alle dingen teruggebracht.
null.verse 57:6: Hij laat de nacht in de dag overgaan en de dag in de nacht: en Hij is de Kenner van het innerlijk.
null.verse 57:7: Gelooft in God en Zijn boodschapper en geeft weg van datgene waarvan Hij u erfgenamen heeft gemaakt.
null.verse 57:8: Wat scheelt u dat gij niet in God gelooft, terwijl de boodschapper u roept om in uw Heer te geloven en Hij een verbond met u heeft gesloten, indien gij gelovig zijt?
null.verse 57:9: Hij is het Die duidelijke tekenen nederzendt aan Zijn dienaar om u van de Duisternissen in het Licht te brengen en voorwaar, God is Liefderijk Genadevol.
null.verse 57:10: Waarom geeft gij niet terwille van God, terwijl aan God de erfenis van de hemelen en de aarde behoort? Degenen onder u die (geld) besteedden en streden vóór de overwinning zijn niet gelijk maar hoger in rang dan degenen die nadien (geld) besteedden en streden.
null.verse 57:11: Ieder die met God een goede lening sluit - Hij zal deze voor hem vermenigvuldigen en hem zal bovendien een voortreffelijke beloning ten deel vallen.
null.verse 57:12: En de Dag waarop gij de gelovige mannen en vrouwen zult zien, hun licht vóór hen en aan hun rechter handen uitstralende; verblijdend nieuws is er voor u op deze Dag! Tuinen waar doorheen rivieren stromen, waarin gij zult vertoeven.
null.verse 57:13: Op de Dag, waarop huichelaars en huichelaarsters tot de gelovigen zullen zeggen: "Laat ons iets van uw licht nemen," zal er gezegd worden: "Gaat terug en zoekt licht.
null.verse 57:14: (De huichelaars zullen tot de gelovigen) roepen: "Waren wij niet met u?" Zij zullen antwoorden: "Ja, maar gij hebt uzelf in verzoeking laten brengen en gewacht en getwijfeld en uw begeerte bedroog u, totdat de verordening van God kwam.
null.verse 57:15: Derhalve zal op deze Dag geen losgeld van u worden aangenomen, noch van degenen die ongelovig waren.
null.verse 57:16: Is voor de gelovigen de tijd nog niet aangebroken dat hun hart nederig worde om God gedachtig te zijn en de Waarheid (op te nemen), die nedergedaald is? En laten zij niet worden zoals zij die het Boek vóórdien ontvingen - voor dezen was de termijn (te) lang geworden waardoor hun hart werd verhard en velen van hen ongehoorzaam werden.
null.verse 57:17: Weet, dat God de aarde doet herleven na haar dood.
null.verse 57:18: De mannen en vrouwen die aalmoezen geven en degenen die met God een goede lening sluiten - deze zal voor hen vermenigvuldigd worden, bovendien zullen zij een eervolle beloning ontvangen.
null.verse 57:19: En zij, die in God en Zijn boodschappers geloven, zijn de waarachtigen en de martelaren in de ogen van hun Heer; zij zullen hun beloning en hun licht ontvangen.
null.verse 57:20: Weet, dat het wereldse leven, alleen spel, vermaak, praalvertoon, pochelij onder elkander, wedijver in vermeerdering van rijkdom en kinderen, is als de regen waardoor het plantenleven de kwekers verblijdt.
null.verse 57:21: Wedijvert om vergiffenis van uw Heer (te verkrijgen) en voor het paradijs, waarvan de breedte gelijk is aan de breedte tussen hemel en aarde, bereid voor degenen, die in God en Zijn boodschappers geloven.
null.verse 57:22: Er gebeurt geen ongeluk op aarde of aan uzelf zonder dat het is opgetekend in het Boek voordat Wij het openbaren.
null.verse 57:23: Opdat gij niet moogt treuren over hetgeen gij verloren hebt noch juichen over hetgeen Hij u heeft gegeven, want God heeft geen pocher of opschepper lief
null.verse 57:24: (Noch degenen,) die vrekkig zijn en de mensen aansporen vrekkig te worden en wie zich van Hem afwendt; voorzeker God is Zichzelf-genoeg, Geprezen.
null.verse 57:25: Voorwaar, Wij zonden Onze boodschappers met duidelijke bewijzen en openbaarden hun het Boek en de Weegschaal opdat het mensdom rechtvaardig moge zijn.
null.verse 57:26: En Wij zonden Noach en Abraham, en Wij plaatsten in hun nageslacht het profetenambt en het Boek.
null.verse 57:27: Dan deden Wij Onze boodschappers in hun voetsporen treden en Wij deden Jezus, de zoon van Maria, opvolgen en Wij gaven hem het Evangelie.
null.verse 57:28: O gij gelovigen, vreest God en gelooft in Zijn boodschapper.
null.verse 57:29: Opdat de mensen van het Boek mogen weten, dat zij geen macht hebben over de genade van God - Voorzeker de genade is in God’s handen, Hij geeft deze aan wie Hij wil.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:1: All that is in the heavens and the earth glorifieth Allah; and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:2: His is the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth; He quickeneth and He giveth death; and He is Able to do all things.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:3: He is the First and the Last, and the Outward and the Inward; and He is Knower of all things.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:4: He it is Who created the heavens and the earth in six Days; then He mounted the Throne.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:5: His is the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth, and unto Allah (all) things are brought back.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:6: He causeth the night to pass into the day, and He causeth the day to pass into the night, and He is knower of all that is in the breasts.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:7: Believe in Allah and His messenger, and spend of that whereof He hath made you trustees; and such of you as believe and spend (aright), theirs will be a great reward.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:8: What aileth you that ye believe not in Allah, when the messenger calleth you to believe in your Lord, and He hath already made a covenant with you, if ye are believers ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:9: He it is Who sendeth down clear revelations unto His slave, that He may bring you forth from darkness unto light; and lo! for you, Allah is Full of Pity, Merciful.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:10: And what aileth you that ye spend not in the way of Allah when unto Allah belongeth the inheritance of the heavens and the earth ? Those who spent and fought before the victory are not upon a level (with the rest of you).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:11: Who is he that will lend unto Allah a goodly loan, that He may double it for him and his may be a rich reward ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:12: On the day when thou (Muhammad) wilt see the believers, men and women, their light shining forth before them and on their right hands, (and wilt hear it said unto them): Glad news for you this day: Gardens underneath which rivers flow, wherein ye are immortal.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:13: On the day when the hypocritical men and the hypocritical women will say unto those who believe: Look on us that we may borrow from your light! it will be said: Go back and seek for light! Then there will separate them a wall wherein is a gate, the inner side whereof containeth mercy, while the outer side thereof is toward the doom.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:14: They will cry unto them (saying): Were we not with you ? They will say: Yea, verily; but ye tempted one another, and hesitated, and doubted, and vain desires beguiled you till the ordinance of Allah came to pass; and the deceiver deceived you concerning Allah;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:15: So this day no ransom can be taken from you nor from those who disbelieved.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:16: Is not the time ripe for the hearts of those who believe to submit to Allah’s reminder and to the truth which is revealed, that they become not as those who received the scripture of old but the term was prolonged for them and so their hearts were hardened, and many of them are evil-livers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:17: Know that Allah quickeneth the earth after its death.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:18: Lo! those who give alms, both men and women, and lend unto Allah a goodly loan, it will be doubled for them, and theirs will be a rich reward.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:19: And those who believe in Allah and His messengers, they are the loyal, and the martyrs are with their Lord; they have their reward and their light; while as for those who disbelieve and deny Our revelations, they are owners of hell-fire.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:20: Know that the life of the world is only play, and idle talk, and pageantry, and boasting among you, and rivalry in respect of wealth and children; as the likeness of vegetation after rain, whereof the growth is pleasing to the husbandman, but afterward it drieth up and thou seest it turning yellow, then it becometh straw.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:21: Race one with another for forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whereof the breadth is as the breadth of the heavens and the earth, which is in store for those who believe in Allah and His messengers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:22: Naught of disaster befalleth in the earth or in yourselves but it is in a Book before we bring it into being - Lo! that is easy for Allah -
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:23: That ye grieve not for the sake of that which hath escaped you, nor yet exult because of that which hath been given.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:24: Who hoard and who enjoin upon the people avarice.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:25: We verily sent Our messengers with clear proofs, and revealed with them the Scripture and the Balance, that mankind may observe right measure; and He revealed iron, wherein is mighty power and (many) uses for mankind, and that Allah may know him who helpeth Him and His messengers, though unseen.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:26: And We verily sent Noah and Abraham and placed the prophethood and the scripture among their seed, and among them there is he who goeth right, but many of them are evil-livers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:27: Then We caused Our messengers to follow in their footsteps; and We caused Jesus, son of Mary, to follow, and gave him the Gospel, and placed compassion and mercy in the hearts of those who followed him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:28: O ye who believe! Be mindful of your duty to Allah and put faith in His messenger.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 57:29: That the People of the Scripture may know that they control naught of the bounty of Allah, but that the bounty is in Allah’s hand to give to whom He will.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:1: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth,- let it declare the Praises and Glory of God: for He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:2: To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: It is He Who gives Life and Death; and He has Power over all things.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:3: He is the First and the Last, the Evident and the Immanent: and He has full knowledge of all things.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:4: He it is Who created the heavens and the earth in Six Days, and is moreover firmly established on the Throne (of Authority).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:5: To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: and all affairs are referred back to God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:6: He merges Night into Day, and He merges Day into Night; and He has full knowledge of the secrets of (all) hearts.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:7: Believe in God and His apostle, and spend (in charity) out of the (substance) whereof He has made you heirs.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:8: What cause have ye why ye should not believe in God?- and the Apostle invites you to believe in your Lord, and has indeed taken your Covenant, if ye are men of Faith.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:9: He is the One Who sends to His Servant Manifest Signs, that He may lead you from the depths of Darkness into the Light and verily God is to you most kind and Merciful.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:10: And what cause have ye why ye should not spend in the cause of God?- For to God belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:11: Who is he that will Loan to God a beautiful loan? for (God) will increase it manifold to his credit, and he will have (besides) a liberal Reward.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:12: One Day shalt thou see the believing men and the believing women- how their Light runs forward before them and by their right hands: (their greeting will be): "Good News for you this Day! Gardens beneath which flow rivers! to dwell therein for aye! This is indeed the highest Achievement!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:13: One Day will the Hypocrites- men and women - say to the Believers: "Wait for us! Let us borrow (a Light) from your Light!" It will be said: "Turn ye back to your rear! then seek a Light (where ye can)!" So a wall will be put up betwixt them, with a gate therein.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:14: (Those without) will call out, "Were we not with you?" (The others) will reply, "True! but ye led yourselves into temptation; ye looked forward (to our ruin); ye doubted (God’s Promise); and (your false) desires deceived you; until there issued the Command of God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:15: "This Day shall no ransom be accepted of you, nor of those who rejected God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:16: Has not the Time arrived for the Believers that their hearts in all humility should engage in the remembrance of God and of the Truth which has been revealed (to them), and that they should not become like those to whom was given Revelation aforetime, but long ages passed over them and their hearts grew hard? For many among them are rebellious transgressors.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:17: Know ye (all) that God giveth life to the earth after its death! already have We shown the Signs plainly to you, that ye may learn wisdom.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:18: For those who give in Charity, men and women, and loan to God a Beautiful Loan, it shall be increased manifold (to their credit), and they shall have (besides) a liberal reward.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:19: And those who believe in God and His apostles- they are the Sincere (lovers of Truth), and the witnesses (who testify), in the eyes of their Lord: They shall have their Reward and their Light.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:20: Know ye (all), that the life of this world is but play and amusement, pomp and mutual boasting and multiplying, (in rivalry) among yourselves, riches and children.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:21: Be ye foremost (in seeking) Forgiveness from your Lord, and a Garden (of Bliss), the width whereof is as the width of heaven and earth, prepared for those who believe in God and His apostles: that is the Grace of God, which He bestows on whom he pleases: and God is the Lord of Grace abounding.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:22: No misfortune can happen on earth or in your souls but is recorded in a decree before We bring it into existence: That is truly easy for God:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:23: In order that ye may not despair over matters that pass you by, nor exult over favours bestowed upon you.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:24: Such persons as are covetous and commend covetousness to men.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:25: We sent aforetime our apostles with Clear Signs and sent down with them the Book and the Balance (of Right and Wrong), that men may stand forth in justice; and We sent down Iron, in which is (material for) mighty war, as well as many benefits for mankind, that God may test who it is that will help, Unseen, Him and His apostles: For God is Full of Strength, Exalted in Might (and able to enforce His Will).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:26: And We sent Noah and Abraham, and established in their line Prophethood and Revelation: and some of them were on right guidance.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:27: Then, in their wake, We followed them up with (others of) Our apostles: We sent after them Jesus the son of Mary, and bestowed on him the Gospel; and We ordained in the hearts of those who followed him Compassion and Mercy.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:28: O ye that believe! Fear God, and believe in His Apostle, and He will bestow on you a double portion of His Mercy: He will provide for you a Light by which ye shall walk (straight in your path), and He will forgive you (your past): for God is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 57:29: That the People of the Book may know that they have no power whatever over the Grace of God, that (His) Grace is (entirely) in His Hand, to bestow it on whomsoever He wills.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:1: All that is in the heavens and the earth magnifies God; He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:2: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He gives life, and He makes to die, and He is powerful over everything.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:3: He is the First and the Last, the Outward and the Inward; He has knowledge of everything.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:4: It is He that created the heavens and the earth in six days then seated Himself upon the Throne.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:5: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth; and unto Him all matters are returned.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:6: He makes the night to enter into the day and makes the day to enter into the night.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:7: Believe in God and His Messenger, and expend of that unto which He has made you successors.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:8: How is it with you, that you believe not in God seeing that the Messenger is calling you to believe in your Lord, and He has taken compact with you, if you are believers?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:9: It is He who sends down upon His servant signs, clear signs, that He may bring you forth from the shadows into the light.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:10: How is it with you, that you expend not in the way of God, and to God belongs the inheritance of the heavens and the earth? Not equal is he among you who spent, and who fought before the victory; those are mightier in rank than they who spent and fought afterwards; and unto each God has promised the reward most fair; and God is aware of the things you do.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:11: Who is he that will lend to God a good loan, and He will multiply it for him, and his shall be a generous wage?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:12: Upon the day when thou seest the believers, men and women, their light running before them, and on their right hands.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:13: Upon the day when the hypocrites, men and women, shall say to those who have believed, ’Wait for us, so that we may borrow your light!’ It shall be said, ’Return you back behind, and seek for a light!’ And a wall shall be set up between them, having a door in the inward whereof is mercy, and against the outward thereof is chastisement.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:14: They shall be calling unto them, ’Were we not with you?’ They shall say, ’Yes indeed; but you tempted yourselves, and you awaited, and you were in doubt, and fancies deluded you, until God’s commandment came, and the Deluder deluded you concerning God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:15: Therefore today no ransom shall be taken from you, neither from those who disbelieved.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:16: Is it not time that the hearts of those who believe should be humbled to the Remembrance of God and the Truth which He has sent down, and that they should not be as those to whom the Book was given aforetime, and the term seemed over long to them, so that their hearts have become hard, and many of them are ungodly?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:17: Know that God revives the earth after it was dead.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:18: Surely those, the men and the women, who make freewill offerings and have lent to God a good loan, it shall be multiplied for them, and theirs shall be a generous wage.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:19: And those who believe in God and His Messengers -- they are the just men and the martyrs in their Lord’s sight; they have their wage, and their light.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:20: Know that the present life is but a sport and a diversion, an adornment and a cause for boasting among you, and a rivalry in wealth and children.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:21: Race to forgiveness from your Lord, and a Garden the breadth whereof is as the breadth of heaven and earth, made ready for those who believe in God and His Messengers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:22: No affliction befalls in the earth or in yourselves, but it is in a Book, before We create it; that is easy for God;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:23: that you may not grieve for what escapes you, nor rejoice in what has come to you; God loves not any man proud and boastful,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:24: such as are niggardly, and bid men to be niggardly.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:25: Indeed, We sent Our Messengers with the clear signs, and We sent down with them the Book and the Balance so that men might uphold justice.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:26: And We sent Noah, and Abraham, and We appointed the Prophecy and the Book to be among their seed; and some of them are guided, and many of them are ungodly.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:27: Then We sent, following in their footsteps, Our Messengers; and We sent, following, Jesus son of Mary, and gave unto him the Gospel.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:28: O believers, fear God, and believe in His Messenger, and He will give you a twofold portion of His mercy; and He will appoint for you a light whereby you shall walk, and forgive you; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 57:29: that the People of the Book may know that they have no power over anything of God’s bounty, and that bounty is in the hand of God; He gives it unto whomsoever He will; and God is of bounty abounding.

Muhammad Asad.verse 57:1: ALL THAT IS in the heavens and on earth extols God’s limitless glory: for He alone is almighty, truly wise!
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:2: His is the dominion over the heavens and the earth; He grants life and deals death; and He has the power to will anything.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:3: He is the First and the Last, and the Outward as well as the Inward: and He has full knowledge of everything.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:4: He it is who has created the heavens and the earth in six aeons, and is established on the throne of His almightiness.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:5: His is the dominion over the heavens and the earth; and all things go back unto God [as their source].
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:6: He makes the night grow longer by shortening the day, and makes the day grow longer by shortening the night; and He has full knowledge of what is in the hearts [of men].
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:7: BELIEVE in God and His Apostle, and spend on others out of that of which He has made you trustees: for those of you who have attained to faith and who spend freely [in God’s cause] shall have a great reward.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:8: And why should you not believe in God, seeing that the Apostle calls you to believe in [Him who is] your Sustainer, and [seeing that] He has taken a pledge from you? [Why should you not believe in Him] if you are able to believe [in anything]?
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:9: It is He who bestows from on high clear messages unto
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:10: His servant, to lead you out of the deep darkness into the light: for, behold, God is most compassionate towards you, a dispenser of grace.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:11: AAnd why should you not spend freely in the cause of God, seeing that God’s
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:12: is the heritage of the heavens and the earth?Not equal are those of you who spent and fought [in God’s cause] before the Victory [and those who did not do so]: they are of a higher rank than those who would spend and fight
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:13: after it – although God has promised the ultimate good to all [who strive in His cause].
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:14: WHO IS IT that will offer up unto God a goodly loan, which He will amply repay?For such [as do so] shall have a noble reward
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:15: on the Day when thou shalt see all believing men and believing women, with their light spreading rapidly before them and on their right, [and with this welcome awaiting them:] "A glad tiding for you today gardens through which running waters flow, therein to abide! This, this is the triumph supreme!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:16: On that Day shall the hypocrites, both men and women, speak
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:17: unto those who have attained to faith: "Wait for us! Let us have a [ray of] light from your light!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:18: they will be told: "Turn back, and seek a light [of your own]!"And thereupon a wall will be raised between them [and the believers], with a gate in it: within it will be grace and mercy, and against the outside thereof, suffering.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:19: They [who will remain without] will call out to those ,
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:20: "Were we not with you? – [to which]; the others will answer: "So it was! But you allowed yourselves to succumb to temptation, and you were hesitant [in your faith], and you were doubtful [of resurrection]; and your wishful thinking beguiled you until God’s command came to pass: for, [indeed, your own] deceptive thoughts about God deluded you!
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:21: "And so, no ransom shall be accepted today from you, and neither from those who were
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:23: refuge – and how evil a journey’s end!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:24: IS IT NOT time that the hearts of all who have attained to faith should feel humble at the remembrance of God and of all the truth that has been bestowed [on them] from on high, lest they become like those who were granted revelation aforetime, and whose hearts have hardened with the passing of time so that many of them are
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:27: know that God gives life to the earth after it has been lifeless!We have indeed made Our messages clear unto you, so that you might use your reason.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:28: Verily, as for the men and women who accept the truth as true, and who
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:29: offer up unto God a goodly loan, they will be amply repaid, and shall have a noble reward [in the life to come].
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:30: For they who have attained to faith in God and His apostles – it is they, they who uphold the truth, and they who bear witness
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:31: before their Sustainer: [and so] they shall have their reward and their light!But as for those who are bent on denying the truth and on giving the lie to Our messages – it is they who are destined for the blazing fire!
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:32: KNOW [O men] that the life of this world is but a play and a passing delight, and a beautiful show, and [the cause of] your boastful vying with one another, and [of your] greed for more and more riches and children.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:33: rain: the herbage which it causes to grow delights the tillers of the soil; but then it withers, and thou canst see it turn yellow; and in the end it crumbles into dust.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:34: suffering severe, or God’s forgiveness and His goodly acceptance: for the life of this world is nothing but an enjoyment of self-delusion.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:36: vie with one another in seeking to attain to your Sustainer’s forgiveness, and
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:37: to a paradise as vast as the heavens and the earth, which has been readied for those who have attained to faith in God and His apostles: such is the bounty of God which He grants unto whomever He wills – for God is limitless in His great bounty.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:38: NO CALAMITY can ever befall the earth, and neither your own selves, unless it be [laid down] in Our decree before We bring it into being: verily, all this is easy for God
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:39: [Know this,] so that you may not despair over whatever
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:42: has come to you: for God does not love any of those who, out of self-conceit, act in a boastful manner –
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:43: those who are niggardly [with God’s bounty] and bid others to be niggardly!And he who turns his back [on this truth ought to know that], verily, God alone is self-sufficient, the One to whom all praise is due!
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:44: Indeed, [even aforetime] did We send forth Our apostles with all evidence of
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:45: truth; and through them We bestowed revelation from on high, and [thus gave you] a balance [wherewith to weigh right and wrong], so that men might behave with equity; and We bestowed [upon you] from on high [the ability to make use of] iron, in which there is awesome power as well as [a source of] benefits for man: and [all this was given to you] so that God might mark out those who would stand up for Him and His apostles, even though He
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:46: is beyond the reach of human perception.
Muhammad Asad.verse 57:47: And, indeed, [to the same end] We sent forth Noah and Abraham [as Our message-bearers], and established prophethood and revelation among their descendants; and some of them were on the right way, but many were iniquitous

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:1: All that is in the heavens and the earth proclaims Allah’s purity, and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:2: To Him belongs the Kingdom of the heavens and the earth.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:3: He is the First and the Last, and the Manifest and the Hidden, and He is All-Knowing about every thing.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:4: He is the One who created the heavens and the earth in six days, then He positioned Himself on the Throne.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:5: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, and to Allah all matters are returned.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:6: He makes the night enter into the day, and makes the day enter into the night, and He is All-Knowing about whatever lies in the hearts.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:8: What is wrong with you that you do not believe in Allah, while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord, and He has taken your covenant, if you are to believe?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:9: He is the One who reveals clear verses to His servant, so that He brings you out from layers of darkness into the light.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:10: And what is wrong with you that you should not spend in the way of Allah, while to Allah belongs the inheritance of the heavens and the earth? Those who spent before the Conquest (of Makkah) and fought are not at par (with others).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:11: Who is there to advance a loan, a good loan, to Allah so that He multiplies it for him, and he may have a noble reward?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:12: On the Day when you will see the believing men and the believing women, their light proceeding in front of them and to their right hands, (it will be said to them,) “Good news for you today! Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:13: - the Day when the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believe, “Wait for us, so that we may have a share from your light.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:14: They (the hypocrites) will call out to them (the believers), “Were we not with you?” They will say, “Yes, (you were,) but you led your souls to a wrong way, and kept waiting (for an evil end to the Muslims), and remained in doubt, and were deluded by fancies, until Allah’s command came to pass, and you were deceived about Allah by the Big Deceiver (Iblīs).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:15: So, no ransom will be accepted from you today, nor from those who disbelieved (openly).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:16: Has the time not yet come for those who believe that their hearts should be humble for the remembrance of Allah and for the truth that has descended (through revelation)? Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:17: Know well that Allah revives the land after its death.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:18: Surely those men who give Sadaqah (alms) and those women who give Sadaqah and have advanced a good loan to Allah, for them it will be multiplied, and for them there is a noble reward.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:20: Know well that the worldly life is but a play and an amusement, and a show of beauty, and exchange of boastful claims between you, and a competition of increase in riches and children.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:21: Compete each other in proceeding towards forgiveness from your Lord and to Paradise the width of which is like the width of the sky and the earth.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:22: No calamity befalls the earth or your own selves, but it is (pre-destined) in a Book before We bring it into being, -Indeed it is easy for Allah.

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:24: -those who are miserly and bid others to be miserly.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:25: We have indeed sent Our messengers with clear proofs, and sent down with them the Book and the Balance, so that people may uphold equity.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:26: Indeed We sent NūH and Ibrāhīm, and kept the Book and prophet-hood (continuing) in their progeny.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:27: Then We made Our messengers follow them one after the other, then We sent after them ‘Īsā, the son of Maryam (Jesus, son of Mary), and gave him the Injīl, and placed compassion and mercy in the hearts of his followers.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:28: O you who believe, fear Allah, and believe in His Messenger, and He will give you two shares (of reward) out of His mercy, and will make for you a light whereby you will walk, and will forgive you- And Allah is Most-Forgiving, Very-Merciful.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 57:29: - so that the People of the Book may know that they have no control over any thing from Allah’s bounty, and that bounty is in Allah’s hand; He gives it to whom He wills, and Allah is the Lord of the great bounty.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 57:6: He is the One Who makes the night pass into the day and the day pass into the night.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 57:7: Believe in Allah and His Messenger (blessings and peace be upon him) and spend (in His cause) out of that (wealth) in which He has made you His vicegerents (and trustees).

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 57:9: He is the One Who sends down clear signs to His (exalted) servant so that He may bring you out of the darkness into the light.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 57:10: And what is the matter with you that you do not spend in the way of Allah, whereas the ownership of the heavens and the earth belongs to Allah alone (you are merely His vicegerents)?
